# Renewed Vigor (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Bard Spells|Bard 5]], [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Effect:** 30-ft.-radius burst centered on you

**Duration:** Instantaneous; see text

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 123

*With a word and a gesture, you suffuse an area with a soft golden light, bestowing a second wind to creatures within.*

When you cast this spell, you remove the [[Fatigued|fatigued]] condition from any creature in the area and cause [[Exhausted|exhausted]] creatures to become [[Fatigued|fatigued]]. In addition, affected creatures gain a +2 bonus to Constitution for 1 round per caster level.
